Package imr.media

The media package provides a general purpose player supporting the following extensions: mp3 mid wav The SoundPlayer class has support to play lists, loop and shuffle.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player
    A Player provides methods to set, play, pause and stop a media player.
    PlayingListListener
    The PlayingListListener interface provides a method to check when a playing list item change.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SoundPlayer
    The SoundPlayer allows playing sound files supporting the following extensions: / mp3 mid wav aif au So an instance of this class can play MIDI files and several audio file formats.

Package imr.media Description

The media package provides a general purpose player supporting the following extensions:
  • mp3
  • mid
  • wav
The SoundPlayer class has support to play lists, loop and shuffle. You can pass a single file, a directory or a m3u file as parameter to the set method. All the process is made transparently; the player manages the file passed as parameter and does its job according to the file type.
